_header: As the nightingale in the thorn
_description: Comparisons with birds interspersed in a Latin prose sermon on Corinthians 6 — three couplets

CULKk424.Transcription:
as þe nyȝthyngale in þe þorneas þe turtyl in
                    þe morneas þe cok a gayn þe dayas þe þrowstyl
                    in þe mayas þe crowe in hys flyȝthas þe oule in
                    þe nyȝth
CULKk424.Editions:
Wenzel,  Siegfried. 
             Preachers, Poets and the English Lyric.
         Princeton: Princeton Univ. Press, 1986: 90.
